de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.columnwise

Class AttributeWiseCDFNormalization<V extends NumberVector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.columnwise.AttributeWiseCDFNormalization<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - vector type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Normalization<V>, ObjectFilter

    @Alias(value="de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.datasource.filter.normalization.AttributeWiseCDFNormalization")
public class AttributeWiseCDFNormalization<V extends NumberVector>
extends Object
implements Normalization<V>
    Class to perform and undo a normalization on real vectors by estimating the distribution of values along each dimension independently, then rescaling objects to the cumulative density function (CDF) value at the original coordinate. This process is for example also discussed in section 3.4 of

    Effects of Feature Normalization on Image Retrieval
    S. Aksoy, R. M. Haralick

    but they do not detail how to obtain an appropriate function `F`.
    Since:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
